question:
You are a code expert. Please use your professional knowledge to generate accurate and professional responses. Be sure to ensure that the generated code is executable for demonstration.

Please help me implement the following requirements using SVG code. The requirement is to create: a musician playing an accordion, a folk music keyboard instrument used on the hexagonal accordion, producing polka sounds.

checklist.title: Is the musician's figure properly drawn using SVG?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the SVG implementation accurately depicts a human figure playing an accordion. Check if the musician has proper body proportions, clear facial features, and a realistic posture that demonstrates accordion playing. Deduct 3 points if the figure lacks detail, 5 points if the posture is anatomically incorrect, and 7 points if the musician is barely recognizable. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the accordion correctly represented with accurate structural details?
checklist.description: Check if the accordion has the proper hexagonal button layout (as specified in the requirements), bellows structure, and keyboard components. The accordion should have both treble and bass sides with visible buttons/keys. Deduct 5 points if the accordion lacks a hexagonal button layout, 5 points if the bellows are missing or poorly represented, and 3 points if the instrument proportions are significantly incorrect. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the interaction between the musician and the accordion realistic?
checklist.description: Evaluate how well the SVG shows the relationship between the performer and the instrument. The hands should be correctly positioned on the keyboard and bellows, with proper finger placement for playing. Deduct 3 points if hand positioning is unrealistic, 5 points if the hands don't connect with the accordion properly, and 7 points if the musician doesn't appear to be actually playing the instrument. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Does the implementation include animation representing accordion playing?
checklist.description: Review whether the SVG includes animations that show the accordion being played - specifically bellows movement (expanding/contracting) and possibly finger movement on the buttons. Score 0 if no animation exists, 5 if only basic bellows animation is implemented, and 10 if there are comprehensive animations including finger movements, bellows action, and possibly even visual cues for the polka sound production. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the code robust?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the SVG code is well-structured, uses proper namespaces, and follows best practices. Check if the code uses groups (<g>) appropriately, implements proper viewBox settings, and has responsive scaling. Deduct 3 points for missing viewBox attributes, 3 points for hardcoded dimensions without scaling considerations, and 4 points for improper element organization. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Are there any innovative features that are eye-catching?
checklist.description: Check whether the code includes surprise features that enhance the experience (e.g., 1. Sound integration when interacting with the accordion 2. Visual music notes emanating during play 3. Interactive elements allowing users to press accordion buttons). Add 3 points for each practical innovative feature implemented (maximum 10 points).

checklist.title: Are there any redundant features?
checklist.description: Strictly check three types of redundancy: 1. Unnecessary visual elements unrelated to the musician or accordion 2. Duplicate SVG elements that could be reused with transforms 3. Over-complicated effects that make the file size unnecessarily large. Deduct 3 points for each redundancy found, and directly deduct 10 points if the core representation is obscured by redundant elements.

checklist.title: Does the code have engineering quality?
checklist.description: Review modular design (such as proper grouping of SVG components), code reuse, and naming conventions. Check if similar elements use <defs> and <use> elements appropriately. Deduct 5 points if there's excessive repetition of similar shapes, 3 points for inconsistent or missing element IDs/classes, and 2 points for poor organization of the SVG structure. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Does the visual representation meet professional design standards?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the overall design follows modern design principles: 1) Harmonious color scheme appropriate for folk music context 2) Proper proportions and visual weight 3) Attention to detail in both musician and instrument. Deduct 3 points for clashing colors, 3 points for inconsistent style between elements, and 4 points for poor overall composition or perspective issues. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the dynamic interaction smooth and realistic?
checklist.description: Judge whether any animations or interactive elements feel natural and aligned with real accordion playing: 1) Bellows movement timed appropriately 2) Button/key depressions synced with playing 3) Any visual representation of music or sound should match accordion movements. Deduct 3 points for jerky animations, 3 points for unrealistic timing, and 4 points for interactions that contradict how an accordion actually works. The full score is 10 points.
